title: Entrepreneur Marketing: How To Get Started When You Only Have A Great Idea
description: An amazing book for entrepreneurs!How To Get Started When You Only Have A Great IdeaSo you have a great idea, now what?Congratulations! Having a “Capital I” Idea is not something that everyone is capable of and we are thrilled that you have one! As you know, Great Ideas do not grow on trees. They are formed in tiny pieces from a wealth of experiences that somehow fuse together and become something bigger than the sum of their parts. If you have ever had a Great Idea, you know that they shine like the sun on a cloudy day and should either be cherished and nurtured, or destroyed and thrown in the garbage can immediately so that you can foster and grow an even better idea the next time.
author: Tara Jacobsen
